title: Integrate `thefactory-db`
description:
A new project has been added to this one 'thefactory-db' . It allows storing documents and entities into a database and performing hybrid search on them (tokenized + embedding search). 'thefactory-tools' is already updated to use it - mainly for the 'search_files' tool that this projects 'FilesManager' uses.

This project needs to be the one that initiates the connection with 'thefactory-db'. It will then pass the appropriate connection info to 'thefactory-tools'.
Apart from integrating with both of the packages well - this project also needs to make sure that all the files within this project's repo are added to 'thefactory-db' and its "documents" table (there's a "addDocument" function exposed). Documents are text conten. For code files within this project, we should assign a "project_code" type to them. For any other project related file - "project_file", and for any external files in the future "external_file". 
On app start - during the loading screen - each project needs to be checked to see if all the relevant documents are in the database - and if not, they need to be added. While the app is working and there are changes to the project's files - they should be appropriately updated.

features.title: Add thefactory-db initialization service in main process
features.description:
Create @src/db/DatabaseManager.js to encapsulate initializing and managing a thefactory-db connection.
Provide async close() methods. Export and wire it in @src/managers.js  (add dbManager export), instantiate before @src/factory-tools/FactoryToolsManager.js , call init() during startup, and close on app shutdown in stopManagers().

features.title: Pass DB connection to thefactory-tools orchestrator
features.description: Update @src/factory-tools/FactoryToolsManager.js s to accept a db connection/info. Modify constructor to receive the DatabaseManager (or its connection parameters) from initManagers. When calling createOrchestrator from thefactory-tools, include a new option db (or dbConfig) per the updated thefactory-tools API. If the API expects env vars, set them before initializing the orchestrator. Ensure search_files tool used by the orchestrator can leverage the same DB instance.

features.title: Implement DocumentIngestionService for project files
features.description:
Create @src/renderer/services/documentIngestionService.ts as a renderer interface and the corresponding @src/document_ingestion/DocumentIngestionManager.js that actually handles the ingestion. The manger handles scanning the repository files and adding them into thefactory-db 'documents' table using addDocument(). Determine document type: 'project_code' for code files (js, ts, tsx, jsx, json, md, css, etc. configurable), 'project_file' for other internal files, 'external_file' reserved for future. For each project (from @src/projects/ProjectsManager.js ), resolve its root directory and iterate via @src/files/FilesManager.js  or a direct file walk (reuse ignore patterns from @src/files/FilesStorage.js). For each file, compute the file patch and metadata (content hash, ext, size, mtime, type). Upsert if missing or if hash/mtime changed; delete or mark archived on file removal. Expose methods: ingestAllProjects(), ingestProject(projectId).
Make sure to dynamically handle files Added/Changed/Deleted(projectId, relPath).

features.title: Hook file watcher events to update thefactory-db
features.description:
Extend @src/files/FilesStorage.js  to emit file change events via an event emitter or callbacks (add onChange hook). In 
@src/files/FilesManager.js '__getStorage' pass handlers from DocumentIngestionService so that on 'add', 'change', 'unlink', 'rename' the corresponding handleFileAdded/Changed/Deleted is called, updating the 'documents' table accordingly. Ensure ignore patterns match FilesStorage. For rename, implement a two-step (delete old + add new) or dedicated move update if thefactory-db supports it.

features.title: Define document typing and code file detection utility
features.description: Add @src/db/fileTyping.js with helpers: isCodeFile(ext, relPath) returning true for typical code/config/docs; classifyDocumentType(relPath) returning 'project_code' or 'project_file'. Use a central list of extensions and allow future configuration via settings. Reuse in DocumentIngestionService.

features.title: Expose minimal DB config to renderer and settings
features.description: Add optional app settings (in @src/settings/SettingsManager.js  schema if present) to configure DB location or connection string. Expose methods over IPC to read current DB status and last sync time. Update preload to include a dbService with getStatus() and onStatus(callback) if needed by the @src/renderer/screens/LoadingScreen.tsx .

features.title: Update FILE_ORGANISATION.md with db subsystem
features.description: Document new directories and their responsibilities: @src/db/DatabaseManager.js  (db connection lifecycle), and @src/document_ingestion/DocumentIngestionManager.js  (project file sync to thefactory-db). Keep aligned with the existing documentation conventions.

features.title: It's possible to configure the 'thefactory-db' postgresql connection string
features.description:
Inside @src/renderer/screens/SettingsView.tsx there needs to be a new section - Database - where the user will be able to provide the connection string to use for connecting with 'thefactory-db' or any extra databases that could potentially be used in the future.
This needs to be stored and loaded on app startup like other app settings in @src/renderer/contexts/AppSettingsContext.tsx and @src/settings/appSettings.js

features.title: Document ingestion inside LoadingScreen
features.description:
Trigger @src/renderer/services/documentIngestionService.ts   ingestAllProjects: () => Promise<any>
(), after initing the database connection inside @src/renderer/screens/LoadingScreen.tsx . We need to have the database populated on app start.  @src/renderer/screens/LoadingScreen.tsx has to wait for the ingestion to complete and show a message like 'Indexing project filesâ€¦'. Keep the UI responsive if sync takes long by enabling progress updates.

features.title: First time db connection string configuration allows ingestion start
features.description:
When a user configures the db connection string inside @src/renderer/screens/SettingsView.tsx - there should be a button to be able to rigger the ingestion when they do so using @src/renderer/services/documentIngestionService.ts .
It should also be made obvious to the user that if they change the connection string - a new ingestion process should be triggered.

features.title: Correctly match types from 'thefactory-db' inside the managers
features.description: Match the types correctly in @src/document_ingestion/DocumentIngestionManager.js and @src/db/DatabaseManager.js
